page.title: 10PERSONALISED NUMBER PLATES
page.content: In Holt,there is the headquarters of a company which deals in the unusual business of vehicle registration plates. Tony Hill, the owner, has become well known for this and other activities such as making pop records and running disco's for children and charities. He has been in the vehicle registration business for twelve years. He started off working as a salesman in central heating. His car at that time had a "cherished" number plate which gave him the idea of starting the vehicle registration business.He now buys hundreds of vehicles a year and sells off interesting or unusual registration numbers to people who want their number plates to appear distinctive or personal. He has provided plates for many famous people and has written two books on registration numbers.
